title: Thank you Riot
body:
I know I'm going to get rage for this, but it bugs me how ungrateful people are,

And so in fear of being the 'goody good'. 
On behalf of everyone who thinks the same way i do, thank you for making this OCE skin for us Riot, we do appreciate it.

we understand that there is no Obligation for you to make every region a skin, it is not in the summoners code or any other code, and you could easily have passed Pool party Ziggs off as our skin and ended the discussion. 
Having the skin in the first place is generous of you considering we did get ziggs and pool party ziggs for free (not to mention cool events like ocean week) and having it 50% off is even more generous. 

so just as a break from everyone raging, know that there are actually people who appreciate this greatly.
thanks

replies.body: Ungrateful? So we wait over two years for something that was supposed to be free but instead they put a bullshit price tag behind it, meanwhile other servers got theirs for free, this is not being ungrateful, why should we be grateful for this? You're just one of those people that will blindly follow bullshit no matter what.

I'm not saying I don't appreciate it. I don't think anyone is, but it's the fact we were basically conned into thinking this was going to be free, only to find out that because we've been given another skin, admittedly one I didn't even care for/want, for free, we wouldn't be getting our server skin for free, like every other server. I appreciate everything Riot does, but sometimes the way they go about things really bugs me. Like you couldn't tell us a year ago.. I'd happily swap the skin I've already received for free for the server one.
yes but at the end of the day every other region got there's for free so why not us
